edu.mines.jtk.mesh

Interface TriMeshView.TriPainter

  • Enclosing class:
    TriMeshView

    public static interface TriMeshView.TriPainter
    Interface for custom triangle painting.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D g, TriMesh.Tri tri, TriMesh.Node na, int xa, int ya, TriMesh.Node nb, int xb, int yb, TriMesh.Node nc, int xc, int yc)
      Paints the specified triangle.

    • Method Detail

      • paint

        void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
         TriMesh.Tri tri,
         TriMesh.Node na,
         int xa,
         int ya,
         TriMesh.Node nb,
         int xb,
         int yb,
         TriMesh.Node nc,
         int xc,
         int yc)
        Paints the specified triangle.
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics context.
        tri - the triangle.
        na - node A of the triangle.
        xa - x pixel coordinate of node A.
        ya - y pixel coordinate of node A.
        nb - node B of the triangle.
        xb - x pixel coordinate of node B.
        yb - y pixel coordinate of node B.
        nc - node C of the triangle.
        xc - x pixel coordinate of node C.
        yc - y pixel coordinate of node C.
